messages.title: Labour can't win in Romsey and Southampton North
messages.content: It's so close here! Only a few votes separate Sandra Gidley from the Conservative and next time, the result could be even closer.

messages.title: Only Sandra Gidley can beat the Conservatives
messages.content: But whatever happens nationally, Labour is out of the race in Romsey and Southampton North. Voting Labour or staying at home could mean a Conservative MP for our area. People who want someone who will always put local people first will be backing Sandra to win.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't win here; only a few votes separate Sandra Gidley from the Conservative. Our next MP will either be Sandra Gidley or the Conservative. No other result is possible.

quotes.text: Who will WORK HARD for Bassett and Swaythling?
